00025 LightMap::LightMap(const LightMap &a)
00026 {

00028         initialized=false;

00030                 map.setImage(cvCloneImage(a.map.getIm()));
00031         reflc.copy(a.reflc);
00032         lightParams=0;
00033         normals=0;

00045 bool LightMap::init(int nbCam, IplImage *model, float corners[4][2], int nx, int ny)
00046 {
00047         IplImage *im = map.getIm();
00048         if(im) cvReleaseImage(&im);
00049         map.setImage(cvCreateImage(cvSize(128,64), IPL_DEPTH_32F, model->nChannels));
00050         cvSet(map.getIm(), cvScalarAll(.1));
00051         if (model->nChannels == 3) {
00052                 im = map.getIm();
00053                 im->channelSeq[0]='B';
00054                 im->channelSeq[1]='G';
00055                 im->channelSeq[2]='R';
00056         }
00057 
00058         if (!model) return false;
00059 
00060         reflc.genGrid(corners, nx, ny);
00061         reflc.averageImage(model,0);
00062 
00063         /*
00064         FILE *IRef= fopen("IRef.txt","w");
00065         if (IRef) {
00066                 for (int i=0; i<reflc.nbTri; i++) 
00067                         fprintf(IRef, "%.6f     ", reflc.avg[i]);
00068                 fprintf(IRef, "\n");
00069                 fclose(IRef);
00070         }
00071         */
00072 
00073         setCamNum(nbCam);
00074         return reflc.avg != 0;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void LightMap::normal2uv(const float n[3], float uv[2]) {
00078         float l = 1/sqrt(n[0]*n[0] + n[1]*n[1] + n[2]*n[2]);
00079         float n0 = n[0]*l;
00080         float n1 = n[1]*l;
00081         float n2 = n[2]*l;
00082         uv[0] = n0*.25f +.25f + (n2>0 ? 0:.5f);
00083         uv[1] = .5f+n1*.5f;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void LightMap::uv2normal(const float uv[2], float n[3]) {
00087         n[0] = (uv[0]-(uv[0]>.5f ? .5f : 0)-.25f)*4;
00088         n[1] = 2*uv[1]-1;
00089         float len = n[0]*n[0] + n[1]*n[1];
00090         if (len>=1) {
00091                 float f = 1/sqrt(len);
00092                 n[0]*=f;
00093                 n[1]*=f;
00094                 n[2]=(uv[0]>.5f ? -0.0f : 0.0f);
00095         }
00096         else n[2] = sqrt(1-len)*(uv[0]>.5f ? -1 : 1);
00097 
00098         float l = 1/sqrt(n[0]*n[0] + n[1]*n[1] + n[2]*n[2]);
00099         n[0]*=l;
00100         n[1]*=l;
00101         n[2]*=l;
00102 }
00103 
00104 CvScalar LightMap::readMap(const float normal[3])
00105 {
00106         if (!isReady()) return cvScalarAll(1);
00107         float uv[2];
00108         normal2uv(normal, uv);
00109         
00110         IplImage *im = map.getIm();
00111         assert(im!=0);
00112         int iu = cvRound(uv[0]*(double)im->width);
00113         int iv = cvRound(uv[1]*(double)im->height);
00114         if (iu<0) iu=0;
00115         if (iv<0) iv=0;
00116         if (iu>=im->width) iu = im->width-1;
00117         if (iv>=im->height) iv = im->height-1;
00118         return cvGet2D(im, iv, iu );
00119 }

00121 bool LightMap::addNormal(float normal[3], LightCollector &lc, int cam)
00122 {
00123         if (lightParams)
00124                 return addNormalLightMap(normal,lc,cam);
00125         else
00126                 return addNormalCalib(normal,lc,cam);

00129 const float *LightMap::getGain(int cam)
00130 {
00131         static const float ones[3] = {1, 1, 1};
00132         if (!isReady()) return ones;
00133         return &CV_MAT_ELEM(*lightParams, float, 2*cam, 0);

00136 const float *LightMap::getBias(int cam)
00137 {
00138         static const float zeroes[3] = {0, 0, 0};
00139         if (!isReady()) return zeroes;
00140         return &CV_MAT_ELEM(*lightParams, float, 2*cam+1, 0);
00141 }

00143 bool LightMap::addNormalLightMap(float normal[3], LightCollector &lc, int cam)
00144 {
00145         if (lightParams==0) return false;
00146         assert(map.getIm()!=0);
00147         assert(cam < nbCam);
00148 
00149         float l = 1/sqrt(normal[0]*normal[0] + normal[1]*normal[1] + normal[2]*normal[2]);
00150         normal[0]*=l;
00151         normal[1]*=l;
00152         normal[2]*=l;
00153 
00154         float val[3];
00155         if (lc.cmpWithRef(reflc, val, getGain(cam), getBias(cam)))
00156                 return updateLightMap(normal, val);
00157         return false;
00158 }
00159 
00160 bool LightMap::updateLightMap(float normal[3], float *val)
00161 {
00162         if (val[0]<0) return false;
00163 
00164         const int nc = map.getIm()->nChannels;
00165 
00166         for (int y=0; y<map.getIm()->height; y++) {
00167                 float *line = (float *)(map.getIm()->imageData + y*map.getIm()->widthStep);
00168 
00169                 for (int x=0; x<map.getIm()->width; x++) {
00170                         float n[3];
00171                         float uv[2] = { float(x)/float(map.getIm()->width), float(y)/float(map.getIm()->height) };
00172                         uv2normal(uv, n);
00173                         float dot = n[0]*normal[0] + n[1]*normal[1] + n[2]*normal[2];
00174 #if 0
00175                         if (dot>0) {
00176                                 dot = acos(dot)*2/M_PI;
00177                                 float s = .2;
00178                                 float f = (1/sqrt(2*M_PI))*exp(-(1-dot)/(2*s*s));
00179                                 line[x] = (1.0f-f)*line[x] + f*val;
00180                         }
00181 #else
00182                         float min_dot=0;
00183                         if (dot>min_dot) {
00184                                 //dot = pow(dot, 16)/2;
00185                                 float angle = (float)(acos(dot)*2/M_PI);
00186                                 //dot = (dot-min_dot)/(1-min_dot);
00187                                 float s = .2f;
00188                                 //float f = (1/sqrt(2*M_PI))*exp(-(1-dot)/(2*s*s));
00189                                 //float f = (1/sqrt(2*M_PI))*exp(-(angle)/(2*s*s));
00190                                 float f = exp(-(angle)/(2*s*s));
00191                                 for (int c=0; c<nc; c++)
00192                                         line[x*nc +c] = (1.0f-f)*line[x*nc + c] + f*val[c];
00193                         }
00194 #endif
00195                 }
00196         }
00197         map.update();
00198         return true;
00199 }

00201 #ifdef HAVE_GLEW
00202 static void printShaderInfoLog(GLuint obj, const char *str, bool ARB)
00203 {
00204         GLint infologLength = 0;
00205         GLint charsWritten  = 0;
00206         char *infoLog;
00207 
00208         if (ARB) glGetObjectParameterivARB(obj, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH,&infologLength);
00209         else glGetShaderiv(obj, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH,&infologLength);
00210 
00211         if (infologLength > 0)
00212         {
00213                 infoLog = (char *)malloc(infologLength);
00214                 if (ARB) glGetInfoLogARB(obj, infologLength, &charsWritten, infoLog);
00215                 else glGetShaderInfoLog(obj, infologLength, &charsWritten, infoLog);
00216                 if (strlen(infoLog)>0) {
00217                         if (str) printf("%s\n", str);
00218                         printf("%s\n",infoLog);
00219                 }
00220                 free(infoLog);
00221         }
00222 }
00223 #endif

00225 #ifdef HAVE_GLEW
00226 static std::string readFile(const char * const file)
00227 {
00228   std::string ret = "";
00229   FILE * fp = fopen(file, "rb");
00230   if (!fp) return "";
00231   fseek(fp, 0, SEEK_END);
00232   int size = (int)ftell(fp);
00233   fseek(fp, 0, SEEK_SET);
00234   char * buf = new char[size + 1];
00235   fread(buf, size, 1, fp);
00236   fclose(fp);
00237   buf[size] = 0;
00238   ret = buf;
00239   delete [] buf;
00240   return ret;
00241 }
00242 
00243 static bool checkErrors(const char *file, int line, bool exitOnFailure=false)
00244 {
00245         GLenum error;
00246         bool r=true;
00247         while ((error = glGetError()) != GL_NO_ERROR) {
00248                 fprintf(stderr, "%s:%d: %s\n", 
00249                                 file, line,
00250                                 (char *) gluErrorString(error));
00251                 if (exitOnFailure)
00252                         exit(-1);
00253                 r=false;
00254         }
00255         return r;
00256         }
00257 #endif

00259 bool LightMap::initGL()
00260 {
00261 #ifdef HAVE_GLEW
00262         if (initialized) return true;
00263   glewInit();
00264         initialized = true;
00265 
00266   ARB = GLEW_ARB_vertex_shader && GLEW_ARB_fragment_shader;
00267   if (!ARB && !glewIsSupported("GL_VERSION_2_0"))
00268   {
00269     printf("No GLSL support\n");
00270     return false;
00271   }
00272   std::string ret;
00273   const char * shaderProg;
00274 
00275   bool ok=true;
00276   ret = readFile("myvert.glsl");
00277   shaderProg = ret.c_str();
00278  
00279   if (ARB) g_vertShader = glCreateShaderObjectARB(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
00280   else g_vertShader = glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
00281   ok = ok && checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00282   
00283   if (ARB) glShaderSourceARB(g_vertShader, 1, &shaderProg, 0);
00284   else glShaderSource(g_vertShader, 1, &shaderProg, 0);
00285   printShaderInfoLog(g_vertShader, "Vertex shader myvert.glsl", ARB);
00286   ok = ok && checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00287 
00288   if (ARB) glCompileShaderARB(g_vertShader);
00289   else glCompileShader(g_vertShader);
00290  
00291   printShaderInfoLog(g_vertShader, "Vertex shader myvert.glsl", ARB);
00292   ok = ok && checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00293 
00294   ret = readFile("myfrag.glsl");
00295   shaderProg = ret.c_str();
00296   if (ARB) g_fragShader = glCreateShaderObjectARB(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
00297   else g_fragShader = glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
00298 
00299   if (ARB) glShaderSourceARB(g_fragShader, 1, &shaderProg, 0);
00300   else glShaderSource(g_fragShader, 1, &shaderProg, 0);
00301 
00302   if (ARB) glCompileShaderARB(g_fragShader);
00303   else glCompileShader(g_fragShader);
00304 
00305   printShaderInfoLog(g_fragShader, "Fragment shader myfrag.glsl", ARB);
00306   ok = ok && checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00307   //if (!ok) return false;
00308 
00309   if (ARB) g_shaderProgram = glCreateProgramObjectARB();
00310   else g_shaderProgram = glCreateProgram();
00311 
00312   if (ARB) glAttachObjectARB(g_shaderProgram, g_vertShader);
00313   else glAttachShader(g_shaderProgram, g_vertShader);
00314 
00315   if (ARB) glAttachObjectARB(g_shaderProgram, g_fragShader);
00316   else glAttachShader(g_shaderProgram, g_fragShader);
00317 
00318   if (ARB) glLinkProgramARB(g_shaderProgram);
00319   else  glLinkProgram(g_shaderProgram);
00320   ok = ok && checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00321 
00322   if (ARB) glValidateProgramARB(g_shaderProgram);
00323   else glValidateProgram(g_shaderProgram);
00324   ok = ok && checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00325   printShaderInfoLog(g_shaderProgram, "glValidateProgram(g_shaderProgram)", ARB);
00326   if (ok) {
00327           cout << "GLSL shaders sucessfully initialized using "
00328                 << (ARB ? "ARB extensions" : "OpenGL 2.0") << ".\n";
00329   } else
00330           cout << "Failed to initialize GLSL shaders.\n";
00331   return ok;
00332 #else
00333         return false;
00334 #endif
00335 }
00336 
00337 void LightMap::enableShader(int cam, CvMat *obj2world)
00338 {
00339 #ifdef HAVE_GLEW
00340         assert(cam < nbCam);
00341         if (!initialized) {
00342                 if (!initGL()) return;
00343         }
00344   if (ARB) glUseProgramObjectARB(g_shaderProgram);
00345   else glUseProgram(g_shaderProgram);
00346   if (!checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__)) {
00347           printShaderInfoLog(g_shaderProgram, "glUseProgram(g_shaderProgram)", ARB);
00348           return;
00349   }
00350 
00351   GLuint shaderTexture, worldToObjectNormal, gain, bias;
00352   if (ARB) {
00353           shaderTexture = glGetUniformLocationARB(g_shaderProgram, "main_texture");
00354           worldToObjectNormal = glGetUniformLocationARB(g_shaderProgram, "worldToObjectNormal");
00355           gain = glGetUniformLocationARB(g_shaderProgram, "gain");
00356           bias = glGetUniformLocationARB(g_shaderProgram, "bias");
00357   } else {
00358           shaderTexture = glGetUniformLocation(g_shaderProgram, "main_texture");
00359           worldToObjectNormal = glGetUniformLocation(g_shaderProgram, "worldToObjectNormal");
00360           gain = glGetUniformLocation(g_shaderProgram, "gain");
00361           bias = glGetUniformLocation(g_shaderProgram, "bias");
00362   }
00363   checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00364 
00365   glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0 + 0);
00366   glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, shaderTexture);
00367   checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00368 
00369   if (ARB) glUniform1iARB(shaderTexture, 0);
00370   else glUniform1i(shaderTexture, 0);
00371   checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00372 
00373   // The sign change is required because we do not like OpenGL's Z axis direction.
00374   // Thus, we flip all normals.
00375   float mat[9];
00376   for (int i=0; i<3; ++i)
00377           for (int j=0; j<3; ++j)
00378                   mat[j*3 +i] = -(float)cvGet2D(obj2world, i, j).val[0];
00379 
00380   float g[3],b[3];
00381   for (int i=0;i<lightParams->cols; i++) {
00382           if (lightParams) {
00383                   g[i] = 1/cvGet2D(lightParams, cam*2, i).val[0];
00384                   b[i] = g[i]*cvGet2D(lightParams, cam*2+1, i).val[0];
00385           } else {
00386                   g[i] = 1;
00387                   b[i] = 0;
00388           }
00389   }
00390   if (ARB) {
00391           glUniform1iARB(shaderTexture, 0);
00392           glUniformMatrix3fvARB(worldToObjectNormal, 1, GL_FALSE, mat);
00393           glUniform4fARB(gain, g[2], g[1], g[0], 1);
00394           glUniform4fARB(bias, b[2], b[1], b[0], 0);
00395   } else {
00396           glUniform1i(shaderTexture, 0);
00397           glUniformMatrix3fv(worldToObjectNormal, 1, GL_FALSE, mat);
00398           glUniform4f(gain, g[2], g[1], g[0], 1);
00399           glUniform4f(bias, b[2], b[1], b[0], 0);
00400   }
00401   checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00402   map.loadTexture();
00403   checkErrors(__FILE__,__LINE__);
00404 #endif
00405 }

00413 #endif
00414 }

00416 void LightMap::setCamNum(int n)
00417 {
00418         obs.clear();
00419         obs.reserve(300000);
00420 
00421         if (normals) delete normals;
00422         normals = new CvGrowMat(256,3, CV_32FC1);
00423         normals->resize(0,3);
00424         nbCam=n;
00425 
00426         if (lightParams)
00427                 cvReleaseMat(&lightParams);
00428         lightParams=0;
00429 }

00431 static void normalize(float normal[3])
00432 {
00433         float l = 1/sqrt(normal[0]*normal[0] + normal[1]*normal[1] + normal[2]*normal[2]);
00434         normal[0]*=l;
00435         normal[1]*=l;
00436         normal[2]*=l;
00437 }
00438 
00439 bool LightMap::addNormalCalib(float normal[3], LightCollector &lc, int cam)
00440 {
00441         assert(nbCam>0);
00442         if (lc.avg==0 || reflc.avg==0) return false;
00443 
00444         bool hasObs=false;
00445 
00446         assert(lc.nbTri == reflc.nbTri);
00447 
00448         int normIdx = normals->rows + nbCam*2;
00449         bool newT=true;
00450         float maxdot= .999;
00451 
00452         normalize(normal);
00453 
00454         // is the normal already in the database ?
00455         for (int i=0; i<normals->rows; i++) {
00456                 float *n2 = (float *)CV_MAT_ELEM_PTR(*normals, i, 0);
00457                 float ndot = n2[0]*normal[0] +
00458                         n2[1]*normal[1] +
00459                         n2[2]*normal[2];
00460                 if (ndot > maxdot) {
00461                         newT=false;
00462                         maxdot = ndot;
00463                         normIdx = i + nbCam*2;
00464                 }
00465         }
00466 
00467 //      if (newT) {
00468 //              obsMat->resize(obsMat->rows, obsMat->cols+1);
00469 //      } 
00470 
00471         for (int i=0; i<lc.nbTri; ++i) {
00472                 float *rv = reflc.avg+i*reflc.avgChannels;
00473                 float *v = lc.avg+i*lc.avgChannels;
00474                 bool ok=true;
00475                 for (int c=0; c<reflc.avgChannels; c++)
00476                         if (!(v[c]>5 && rv[c] >5 && v[c]<250 && rv[c] <250)) 
00477                                 ok=false;
00478                 if (ok) {
00479                         hasObs = true;
00480 
00481                         Observation o;
00482                         o.camCol = cam*2;
00483                         o.normalCol = normIdx;
00484                         
00485                         for (int c=0; c<reflc.avgChannels; c++) {
00486                                 o.camVal[c] = - v[c]/255.0f;
00487                                 o.normalVal[c] = rv[c]/255.0f;
00488                         }
00489                         obs.push_back(o);
00490                 }
00491         }
00492 
00493         if (newT&&hasObs){
00494                 // add the normal vector
00495                 normals->resize(normals->rows+1, normals->cols);
00496                 float *n = (float *)CV_MAT_ELEM_PTR(*normals, normals->rows-1,0);
00497                 n[0] = normal[0];
00498                 n[1] = normal[1];
00499                 n[2] = normal[2];
00500         }
00501         return true;
00502 }
00503 
00504 static bool saveMat(const CvMat *m, const char *fn)
00505 {
00506         ofstream f(fn);
00507 
00508         if (!f.good()) return false;
00509 
00510         for (int j=0; j<m->rows; j++) {
00511                 for (int i=0; i<m->cols; i++) {
00512                         double v = cvGet2D(m, j, i).val[0];
00513                         f << v;
00514                         if (i+1 < m->cols) f<<'\t';
00515                 }
00516                 f << endl;
00517         }
00518         f.close();
00519         return true;
00520 }
00521 
00522 static CvGrowMat *loadMat(const char *fn)
00523 {
00524         ifstream f(fn);
00525 
00526         if (!f.good()) return 0;
00527 
00528         CvGrowMat *m = new CvGrowMat(128,3, CV_32FC1);
00529         m->resize(1,1);
00530 
00531         int nrow=0;
00532         do {
00533                 char line[4096];
00534                 f.getline(line, 4095);
00535                 line[4095]=0;
00536                 if (!f.good()) break;
00537 
00538                 ++nrow;
00539 
00540                 int ncols=1;
00541                 int len = strlen(line);
00542                 char *last=line;
00543                 for (int i=0;i<len+1;i++) {
00544                         if (line[i]==' ' || line[i]=='\t' || line[i]==0) {
00545                                 line[i] = 0;
00546                                 float val;
00547                                 if (sscanf(last, "%f", &val)==1) {
00548                                         m->resize(nrow,max(ncols, m->cols));
00549                                         cvSet2D(m, nrow-1, ncols-1, cvScalarAll(val));
00550                                         ncols++;
00551                                 }
00552                         last = line+i+1;
00553                         }
00554                 }
00555         } while (f.good());
00556 
00557         return m;
00558 }
00559 
00560 double LightMap::getObsMat(int i, int j, int c)
00561 {
00562         if (j == obs[i].camCol) return (double)obs[i].camVal[c];
00563         if (j == (obs[i].camCol+1)) return 1;
00564         if (j == obs[i].normalCol) return (double)obs[i].normalVal[c];
00565         return 0;
00566 }
00567 
00568 double LightMap::getObsElem(const vector<Observation>::iterator &it, int i, int c)
00569 {
00570         if (it->camCol == i) return it->camVal[c];
00571         if (it->camCol+1 == i) return 1;
00572         if (it->normalCol == i) return it->normalVal[c];
00573         return 0;
00574 }
00575 
00576 void LightMap::computeAtA(CvMat *AtA, int channel)
00577 {
00578         for (vector<Observation>::iterator it = obs.begin();
00579                         it!=obs.end(); ++it) 
00580         {
00581                 int idx[3] = {it->camCol, it->camCol+1, it->normalCol};
00582                 for (unsigned i=0; i<3; i++) {
00583                         for (unsigned j=0; j<3; j++) {
00584                                 int i_ = idx[i];
00585                                 int j_ = idx[j];
00586                                 if (i_ <= j_) {
00587                                         double v = getObsElem(it,i_, channel)*getObsElem(it,j_, channel);
00588                                         if (v!=0) {
00589                                                 double d = v+cvGetReal2D(AtA, i_, j_);
00590                                                 cvSetReal2D(AtA, i_, j_, d);
00591                                                 cvSetReal2D(AtA, j_, i_, d);
00592                                         }
00593                                 }
00594                         }
00595                 }
00596         }
00597         /*
00598         for (int y=1;y<AtA->height; y++)
00599                 for (int x=0;x<y; x++) {
00600                         CV_MAT_ELEM(*AtA, float, y, x) = CV_MAT_ELEM(*AtA, float, x, y);
00601                 }
00602         */
00603 }
00604 
00605 bool LightMap::save(const char *lightParamsFN, const char *normalsFN)
00606 {
00607         return saveMat(lightParams,lightParamsFN) &&
00608                 saveMat(normals, normalsFN);
00609 }
00610 
00611 bool LightMap::computeLightParams()
00612 {
00613         int obsMatCols=normals->rows+2*nbCam;
00614         int sizes[] = {obs.size(), obsMatCols};
00615 
00616         if (lightParams) cvReleaseMat(&lightParams);
00617         lightParams = cvCreateMat(obsMatCols, reflc.avgChannels, CV_32FC1);
00618         sizes[0] = sizes[1] = obsMatCols;
00619 
00620         // create temporary matrices
00621         CvMat *AtA = cvCreateMat(obsMatCols,obsMatCols, CV_32FC1);
00622         CvMat *w = cvCreateMat(obsMatCols, 1, CV_32FC1);
00623         CvMat *V = cvCreateMat(obsMatCols, obsMatCols, CV_32FC1);
00624 
00625         for (int c=0; c<reflc.avgChannels; c++) {
00626                 cvSetZero(AtA);
00627                 computeAtA(AtA, c);
00628 
00629                 /* char atafn[64];
00630                 sprintf(atafn,"ata%d.mat",c);
00631                 saveMat(AtA, atafn);
00632                 */
00633 
00634                 cvSVD(AtA, w, 0, V, CV_SVD_MODIFY_A);
00635 
00636                 CvMat sub, lpc;
00637                 cvGetCol(V, &sub, V->cols-1);
00638                 cvGetCol(lightParams, &lpc, c);
00639                 cvScale(&sub, &lpc, 1.0/cvGet2D(&sub,0,0).val[0]);
00640 
00641                 /*
00642                    std::cout << "Eigen values:";
00643                    for (int i=0; i<w->rows; ++i) {
00644                    float v = (float)cvGet2D(w, i, 0).val[0];
00645                    std::cout << " " << v;
00646                    }
00647                    std::cout << std::endl;
00648                  */
00649         }
00650         cvReleaseMat(&V);
00651         cvReleaseMat(&AtA);
00652 
00653         // construct light map
00654         cvSet(map.getIm(), cvScalarAll(.1));
00655         cvReleaseMat(&w);
00656 
00657         /*
00658         std::cout << "Camera Values:\n";
00659         for (int c=0; c<nbCam; ++c) {
00660                 float g = (float)cvGet2D(lightParams, c*2, 0).val[0];
00661                 float b = (float)cvGet2D(lightParams, c*2+1, 0).val[0];
00662                 std::cout <<"     cam " << c << ": "<< g <<", " << b << std::endl;
00663         }
00664         */
00665         buildMapFromSamples();
00666         return true;
00667 }
00668 
00669 void LightMap::buildMapFromSamples()
00670 {
00671         for (int i=0; i<normals->rows; ++i) {
00672                 updateLightMap((float *)CV_MAT_ELEM_PTR(*normals, i, 0), 
00673                                 &CV_MAT_ELEM(*lightParams, float, i+2*nbCam, 0));
00674         }
00675 }
00676 
00677 bool LightMap::load(const char *lightParamsFN, const char *normalsFN)
00678 {
00679         CvGrowMat *lp= loadMat(lightParamsFN);
00680         if (!lp) return false;
00681         lightParams = cvCreateMat(lp->rows, lp->cols, CV_32FC1);
00682         cvCopy(lp, lightParams);
00683         printf("Loaded lightParams: %dx%d.\n", lp->rows, lp->cols);
00684         delete lp;
00685         normals = loadMat(normalsFN);
00686         int nlights = lightParams->rows - 2*nbCam;
00687         if (!normals || ((normals->rows) < nlights)) {
00688                 if (normals) {
00689                         printf("Not enough normals. Expecting %d cameras. Found %d normals and %d parameters.\n",
00690                                 nbCam, normals->rows, lightParams->rows);
00691                 }
00692                 cvReleaseMat(&lightParams);
00693                 return false;
00694         }
00695         if (normals->rows > nlights)
00696                 normals->resize(nlights,3);
00697 
00698         /*
00699         std::cout << "Camera Values:\n";
00700         for (int c=0; c<nbCam; ++c) {
00701                 float g = (float)cvGet2D(lightParams, c*2, 0).val[0];
00702                 float b = (float)cvGet2D(lightParams, c*2+1, 0).val[0];
00703                 std::cout <<"     cam " << c << ": "<< g <<", " << b << std::endl;
00704         }
00705         */
00706 
00707         buildMapFromSamples();
00708         
00709         return true;
00710 }
00711 
00712 bool LightMap::saveImage(const char *filename)
00713 {
00714         IplImage *image = map.getIm();
00715         if (image==0) return false;
00716         IplImage *im = cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(image), IPL_DEPTH_8U,image->nChannels);
00717         //double min=0, max=2;
00718         //cvMinMaxLoc(image, &min, &max);
00719         cvConvertScale(image, im, 128, 0);
00720         int r = cvSaveImage(filename, im);
00721         cvReleaseImage(&im);
00722         return r!=0;
00723 }
